title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1021.2 - Vehicle limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1021.2 - Vehicle limitations

State Regulations
(a) The
toll rates set forth in section
1021.1
of this Part are applicable
only to vehicles which do not exceed the following limits: (1)

Width--overall, including load: Tunnels--8 ft. 6 in. Bridges--91/2 ft. (2)

Height-overall, from roadway: Tunnels--12 ft. 9 in. Bridges: Triborough--14 ft. 6 in., except trucks onbound from

Manhattan are limited to 13 ft. 10 in. Bronx--Whitestone-14 ft. 6 in. Throgs Neck--15 ft. Cross Bay Veterans Memorial--13 ft. 6 in. Marine Parkway Gil Hodges Memorial--13 ft. Henry Hudson--12 ft. Verrazano-Narrows--15 ft. upper level; 14 ft. 5 in. lower
level
(3)

Weight: Tunnels and bridges--limit of 80,000 lbs., as prescribed by

New York State Department of Transportation regulations. (b) No vehicles exceeding the
limits above set forth shall be permitted in or upon the facilities, except by
prior arrangement made through the officer in charge of the facility. Vehicles
requiring special handling shall pay double the appropriate toll rate
hereinbefore set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1021.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
